body_html:
@goldsborough we probably also need to fix the Windows CI error:
18:27:02 C:/Jenkins/workspace/pytorch-builds/pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-build/aten/src\ATen/optional.h(345): error C2614: 'at::optional<at::Tensor>': illegal member initialization: 'OptionalBase' is not a base or member, which happens on master as well
body_text:
@goldsborough we probably also need to fix the Windows CI error:
18:27:02 C:/Jenkins/workspace/pytorch-builds/pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-build/aten/src\ATen/optional.h(345): error C2614: 'at::optional<at::Tensor>': illegal member initialization: 'OptionalBase' is not a base or member, which happens on master as well
body:
@goldsborough we probably also need to fix the Windows CI error: 
`18:27:02 C:/Jenkins/workspace/pytorch-builds/pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-build/aten/src\ATen/optional.h(345): error C2614: 'at::optional<at::Tensor>': illegal member initialization: 'OptionalBase' is not a base or member`, which happens on master as well
